name: That Time A G.O.O.S.E Became My Arch-Nemisis
name_original: That Time A G.O.O.S.E Became My Arch-Nemisis
description:
Made for the Portland Indie Game Squad Summer Slow Jam: Boss Fight!!
* Start at 50% your normal audio! Then go from there! *

*RPGmaker volume is NOTORIOUSLY LOUD in the editor, and I had my system volume low during development.*

Technical theme:  Boss Fight, Creative theme:  Dreams and Nightmares

While trying to make the third project for my Sailors and Sorcerers setting, I just couldn't get anything going.  Than I saw this imagine  of a photo shopped sign, pertaining to a level 5 Goose Warning, AND EVERYTHING CHANGED.

Deliver pizza in a magical  science fantasy setting,  while having to deal with a GOOSE that will chase you down and either try to steal your pizza, or murder you!  Or face the GOOSE head on!  All paths lead to a thrown down fitting of any anime protagonist!

Bound to be some bugs, and jank. This game definitely belongs in the "Scuffed" collection!

Title font from somepx!
